title: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: If the localization key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When attempting to add a localization key without any value, the externalized text does not appear in the chart.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed properly in the chart when a valid localization key is provided.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Attempt to add a localization key without any value. 2. Set a valid externalize text in the chart title.
